means: 里拉（琴）（古希腊的一种弦乐器，琴身作U形）

sentence.Network_en: Only a few musicians know how to strike a lyre.
sentence.Network_cn: 只有少数的音乐家会弹七弦琴了.

sentence.Network_en: The symbols of Apollo were the wolf, swan, raven, stag, dolphin, laurel, and lyre.
sentence.Network_cn: 阿波罗的象征物是狼 、 天鹅 、 渡鸦 、 雄鹿 、 海豚 、 桂冠和竖琴.

sentence.Network_en: The poetry was chanted to the accompaniment of the lyre.
sentence.Network_cn: 诗歌吟唱试用七弦琴伴奏的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 音乐形容词 - benhe30的日志 - 网易博客 ... zither 齐特拉琴,九弦琴 lyre 里拉琴,七弦琴 lute 诗琴, 硫特琴.
里拉(lyre)和阿夫洛斯(aulos)分别是这两类乐器的代表如何防止香蕉变黑？
而从里拉琴（Lyre）到鲁特琴（Lute）间的演变，在神话中，'ud的发明则显得更加微妙。从西元9、10世纪流传了两种变化形式的'ud…
《源自希腊文“和竖琴 (lyre) 而唱”的意思》形容词>>1 抒情的,抒情诗的a ~ poet 抒情诗人~ poetry 抒情诗2 音乐的,歌剧式的~ drama 歌.

list.abs: 【猛禽】 bird of prey【琴鸟】 lyre bird【青鸟】 messenger bird of the goddess mother
With his gold lyre and his sweet voice he led the choir of the Muses ., 他手拿金里拉 , 用悦耳的声音指挥着缪斯女神的合唱队.
using the intestines from a cow stolen from Apollo and the hollow tortoise shell , he made the first lyre .利用从阿波罗那里偷来的母牛的肠和空的龟壳，他造了第一部七弦琴。
without lyre lute or chorus , Death a silent pilot comes at last .没有琴瑟合唱，领航的死神最终到来，悄然无语。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: via Old French lire and Latin lyra from Greek lura

entry.def: A lyre is a stringed instrument that looks like a small harp.

means.word_mean: 1. a harp used by ancient Greeks for accompaniment
